SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuraSkillsListener
Listener class for handling AuraSkills-related events.
BaseListener
 
BedrockHelper
 
BlockEventsListener
A listener that handles block-related events such as BlockBreakEvent and BlockPlaceEvent, updating players' quest progress accordingly.
DevCommands
 
EntityCategoryMatcher
The EntityCategoryMatcher class contains a single method, EntityCategoryMatcher.matches(String, String), which takes a target category (e.g., "HOSTILE", "PASSIVE", "BOSS", or "UNDEAD") and an entity type, then returns a boolean indicating whether the given entity type matches the target category.
LeaderboardManager
Manages the leaderboard for tracking player quest scores.
LifeEventsListener
 
MobKillListener
A listener that handles EntityDeathEvents where a player is the killer, updating players' quest progress accordingly for killing mobs.
PlayerJoinListener
 
Quest
Represents a quest that can be completed by a player.
QuestAssigner
Manages the assignment of quests to players based on various criteria such as tier, rarity, and player progress.
QuestCommand
Command executor for the "quest" command.
QuestFilter
The QuestFilter enum defines different filters that can be applied to quests.
QuestGUI
 
QuestLoader
 
QuestManager
 
QuestNotifier
The QuestNotifier class provides utility methods for notifying players about quest progress and completion in a Bukkit/Spigot plugin.
QuestPlugin
The main class for QuestPlugin, handling plugin initialization, event listeners, commands, config loading, and quest data management.
QuestRarity
 
QuestStorageManager
Manages storage of quest data for players in a plugin.
QuestTemplate
Represents a template for a quest.
QuestTemplate.Objective
Represents an objective within a quest.
QuestTier
Represents the tier of a quest.
QuestType
Represents the type of objective in a quest.
RarityRoller
The RarityRoller class provides functionality for rolling quest rarities and calculating bonus multipliers based on configuration.
RewardHandler
The RewardHandler class handles all reward-related operations for quests in the QuestPlugin.
